About

Quantum Flow L.L.C-FZ is a Dubai Free Zone consultancy (Meydan) providing marketing, PR, and online marketing services to international clients.

  • Registered activity: Marketing, PR & Online Marketing Services
  • Formation Date: 25/03/2024 · Formation No. 2417494
  • Services are advisory/content-based; we do not hold client funds.
  • Work is conducted remotely and invoiced per engagement.

Company

  • Jurisdiction: Dubai, U.A.E (Meydan Free Zone)
  • Address: Meydan Grandstand, 6th floor, Meydan Road, Nad Al Sheba
  • Area Served: EU · MENA · APAC (remote)
